name: custom-auto-fold
description: Automatically fold specific sections when files are opened

linePattern.description: Regex pattern for line to fold (can match any line within folding section)

fileGlob.description: Only auto fold files that match this file glob (for glob examples see https://github.com/motemen/minimatch-cheat-sheet)

firstMatchOnly.description: Only fold the first matching line (if false, every line that matches will be folded)

custom-auto-fold.delay.description: ms delay before starting auto fold when files are opened.  Auto fold must start after the folding ranges have been defined on the document.  Increase or decrease this delay based on your vscode performance.

custom-auto-fold.betweenCommandsDelay.description: ms delay between commands.  Increasing this may solve issues if your vscode experiences lag.
